label: 御請来目録
本: Jewel in the Ashes: Buddha Relics and Power in Early Medieval Japan . Harvard University Asia Center . 2000
見出し読み: ごしょうらいもくろく
見出し読み_mod: ごしょうらいもくろく
説明文: List of scriptures, implements, art works, relics and other objects Kūkai brought back from China which he submitted to the imperial court following his return in late 806. The term shōrai mokuroku more generally refers to any such list compiled by a cleric following hisreturn from study in China.
